CustomField.formula: If (OR ( AND (RecordType.Name ='Online', OR( ISPICKVAL(Claimed_Compensation_Type__c ,'Voucher'), ISPICKVAL(Claimed_Compensation_Type__c ,'Points'))), OR(RecordType.Name ='Voucher',RecordType.Name ='Points')),'Points/Voucher', IF(OR(RecordType.Name ='Bank Transfer',RecordType.Name ='Card Refund', RecordType.Name ='Paypal'),'Cash',''))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Tells whether the claim is a cash claim or not
CustomField.label: Compensation Claim Type
